text:
@GavinNewsom The goal of flattening the curve is to avoid swamping hospitals, same # of people get infected. If we're shifting the argument to "buying time" until there is a vaccine, let's hear some prospective timelines. Otherwise we aim for herd immunity a la Sweden.
https://t.co/lyR0xS1owD
